動物用藥品名稱: 輝瑞豬萎縮性鼻炎、豬丹毒、放線桿菌胸膜肺炎、巴氏桿菌不活化混合菌苗
業者名稱: 輝瑞大藥廠股份有限公司
地址: 601 WEST CORNHUSKER, HIGHWAY, LINCOLN NEBRASKA, 68521 U.S.A.
效能(適應症): 預防豬萎縮性鼻炎、豬丹毒和胸膜嗜血桿菌、敗血性巴氏桿菌所引起的呼吸道疾病。
ingredients: T CONTAINS CHEMICALLY INACTIVATED CULTURES OF BORDETELLABRONCHISEPTICA,  ERYSIPELOTHIRX RHUSIOPATHIAE,  HAEMOPHILUSPLEUROPNEUMONIAE (SEROTYPES 1, 3, 4, 5), PASTEURELLA MULTOCIDA.COMBINED WITH A STERILE ADJUVANT TO ENHANCE THE IMMUNE RESPONSE.
